name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Ronald Eugene PAGE, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO, LARSEN and FLAHERTY, JJ.

casebody.head_matter:
402 A.2d 507
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Ronald Eugene PAGE, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted April 16, 1979.
Decided July 5, 1979.
Lester L. Dolfman, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawaler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Val Wilson, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO, LARSEN and FLAHERTY, JJ.
